sentences.en: Dulcimer usually appears in a happy music.
sentences.cn: 扬琴一般用来弹奏轻快的曲子.

sentences.en: Stringed instruments musical instrument ( zheng, guqin, dulcimer, harp on ) which kind cheapest? Most easy to learn?
sentences.cn: 弦乐乐器 ( 古筝, 古琴, 扬琴, 竖琴等等 ) 哪种最便宜? 最好学?

sentences.en: That at what time ye hear the sound of the cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, dulcimer, and all kinds of musick, ye fall down and worship the golden image that Nebuchadnezzar the king hath set up
sentences.cn: 你们一听见角，笛，琵琶，琴，瑟，笙，和各样乐器的声音，就当俯伏敬拜尼布甲尼撒王所立的金像。

sentences.en: The ancestry of the piano can be traced to the early keyboard instruments of the fifteenth and sixteenth centuries -- the spinet, the dulcimer, and the virginal.
sentences.cn: 钢琴的家系可以追溯至15至16世纪早期的键盘乐器，包括小型拨弦琴、洋琴和维金娜琴。

sentences.en: The instruments are mainly zhuiqin, two - string Chinese violin, dulcimer, lute and others.
sentences.cn: 伴奏乐器中, 主奏乐器为坠琴,另有二胡 、 扬琴 、 琵琶等乐器.

trans.tran_en: a musical instrument with up to 100 strings, played with light hammers
